data.title: Jimmy Fallon Tonight Show LIVE updates — Jacob Elordi reveals shock A-list connection as he's 'still dating' Olivia Jade
data.meta_description: JACOB Elordi will appear on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon as rumors swirl about his breakup with Olivia Jade - and he's not tonight's only gu
data.text:
Live Blog

SALT-BURNED?

Jimmy Fallon Tonight Show LIVE updates — Jacob Elordi reveals shock A-list connection as he’s ‘still dating’ Olivia Jade

JACOB Elordi has revealed a surprising A-list connection on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon as rumors swirl about his breakup with Olivia Jade.

During Thursday's show, Jacob, 26, told host Jimmy Fallon that he was surprised to learn that legendary actor Leonardo DiCaprio is a fan of HBO's Euphoria, which Jacob stars in.

The Saltburn actor's late night interview came as speculation sparked that he and Olivia Jade Giannulli had broken up again recently after the on-and-off couple got back together in June of 2023.

However, sources with direct knowledge told TMZ that the pair is "still dating" because they were reportedly spotted together in New York ahead of Jacob's debut hosting gig on Saturday Night Live this weekend.

Read our Tonight Show blog for the latest updates...

Jacob Elordi to make SNL debut

Jacob Elordi is set to host Saturday Night Live for the first time this weekend.

The actor will make his SNL debut alongside musical guest Reneé Rapp on Saturday, January 20.

Tune in tomorrow at 11:30 pm ET on NBC to watch the show.

Who was on last night's show

Last night on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon, Jacob Elordi and Ariana DeBose were interviewed by host Jimmy Fallon.

The show ended with a performance of Honey by BJ The Chicago Kid featuring Chlöe.

Jimmy Fallon met his wife in 2004

Jimmy and Nancy first met each other when the latter paid a visit to the SNL set during Drew Barrymore's guest-host appearance in 2004.

After that first encounter, they crossed paths again when Fallon was cast in Drew's 2005 romantic comedy Fever Pitch.

Nancy recounted: "[Barrymore] and Jimmy were practicing a sketch…I kind of crept in quietly and all of a sudden Jimmy goes, 'Hey, Nancy! You're Nancy? Hi, it's so nice to meet you, welcome.'

"And I felt just so embraced and cool, like, ‘Thank you! Thank you for welcoming me in. This is so nice, it’s so intimidating [here].’

"So I had that thought from years before, going in. But then on the set [of Fever Pitch], we were on location and that really creates this camp feel for everybody.

"And he was just so friendly and fun and welcoming and he loved music."

By August 2007, the couple was engaged after Fallon proposed to Nancy at her family's home in Wolfeboro, New Hampshire.

About Jimmy Fallon’s wife, part three

The Saturday Night Live alum explained to PEOPLE: "He goes, 'Richard is a fan, he likes you, so he'll rent you the island for two days, three days.'

"Hands down, one of the best days and nights of my entire life."

Nancy recalled: "We got this place for three days, so Jimmy goes, 'What if we got married in three weeks, instead of next summer?' And I'm like, 'This is the best idea of all human time.'

"So we had 12 people at our wedding. I just got a dress done as fast as I could. We didn't care."

About Jimmy Fallon’s wife, continued

At the time, Jim was working as a production assistant on Drew's 1995 film Mad Love.

On December 22, 2007, Nancy tied the knot with The Tonight Show host Jimmy Fallon.

The pair walked down the aisle in a wedding ceremony that took place on Necker Island, a private island owned by Richard Branson.

While remembering his nuptials with Nancy, Fallon mentioned how they were in the midst of planning when the latter's travel agent received an offer to use the island from Branson.

About Jimmy Fallon's wife

Born on May 18, 1967, Nancy Juvonen is an American film producer from Connecticut who was later raised in Mill Valley, California.

She is the co-owner of Flower Films; a production company she co-founded with Drew Barrymore.

Flower Films is the company behind the Charlie's Angels movies, Never Been Kissed, Donnie Darko, and The Drew Barrymore Show.

She and Drew were introduced to each other through Nancy's brother Jim.

Jacob Elordi fans celebrated possible breakup

Fans of Jacob Elordi were excited to hear about his possible split with Olivia Jade - but the rumors turned out to be false.

About Olivia Jade, part three

Olivia, meanwhile, was said to be embarrassed over the photos, which were released by prosecutors as the case went on.

She posted to YouTube sporadically in the years following the scandal but has only recently returned to filming videos more consistently.

Olivia's latest video - in which she made the prison joke - details a week in her life at the start of 2024.

She showed off her cooking skills and got ready for a day of shopping with Loughlin, who made an appearance in the video.

But fans were surprised that Olivia didn't mention her boyfriend, Australian actor Jacob Elordi.

The two were first linked in December 2021 and have reportedly been dating on and off since.

About Olivia Jade, part two

On top of that, Loughlin and Giannulli - who tied the knot in 1997 - also paid $500,000 to USC to gain their daughters' entry to the school.

Loughlin and Giannulli pleaded guilty in May 2020 to conspiracy to commit wire and mail fraud.

The former Full House star was released from prison in December 2020 after serving two months.

She also was forced to pay a $150,000 fine.

Giannulli was released in April 2021 after serving five months and paying a fine of $250,000.

About Jacob Elordi's girlfriend Olivia Jade

Olivia Jade started making YouTube videos in 2014, quickly making a career of being an influencer.

But in 2019, her partnerships with brands like Sephora and Tresemmé came to a halt after her parents were arrested.

Loughlin and Giannulli were indicted as part of a massive college admissions scandal, in which they faked a photo of Olivia and her sister Isabella rowing to get them admitted to USC as crew recruits.

Neither Olivia nor Isabella were rowers.

Olivia Jade recently cracked prison joke

Olivia, the daughter of TV star Lori Loughlin and fashion designer Mossimo Giannulli, recently joked about her parents' prison stints for their role in the scandal, in which they paid $500,000 to get their two kids into the University of Southern California.

"You guys I finally ordered wallpaper for the kitchen so it's not going to feel so sterile," Olivia said in the video.

"It's not going to feel like a prison. Save the jokes, I don't want to hear it."

Olivia said she set viewers up for the joke.

The YouTube video was the latest to be posted since Olivia's return to the platform.

Jacob Elordi’s relationship history – Zendaya

Jacob Elordi sparked dating rumors with his Euphoria co-star Zendaya when they were spotted getting cozy on holiday in Greece in the summer of 2019.

The pair were then spotted on dates in California and were photographed kissing in New York City in February 2020.

The two were last photographed together in March 2020 in Los Angeles.

Despite rumors, the two never confirmed a relationship.

Jacob Elordi’s relationship history – Joey King

Jacob Elordi started dating Kissing Booth co-star Joey King in 2017.

The pair met on the set of the film and started out as friends before their relationship became something more when King revealed in an interview with Seventeen that Elordi was more than a friend.

But it quickly got awkward when they broke up and had to film two more movies together.

The pair began to fuel rumors of their breakup when they removed all traces of each other from their social media accounts and even unfollowed each other at the start of 2019.

Jacob Elordi's relationship history - Kaia Gerber

Jacob Elordi was dating American actress and model Kaia Gerber for about a year.

A source exclusive revealed the break-up news in November 2021 to ET, stating that it was "amicable."

"Kaia Gerber and Jacob Elordi have broken up," the source told the media outlet. "Their split is amicable."

The news came just weeks after Gerber was seen deleting photos of him off Instagram.

The former couple first sparked rumors in September 2020, and a relationship was confirmed a month later.

Prior to this relationship, Gerber had dated SNL star Pete Davidson.

Inside Jacob Elordi's dating history

Jacob Elordi has been linked to Olivia Jade Giannulli, daughter of actress Lori Loughlin and Mossimo founder Mossimo Giannulli, since 2021.

They were spotted grabbing coffee in Los Angeles in December of that year, prompting relationship rumors.

The pair appeared to have had a low-key afternoon as Giannulli was dressed in a sweat suit and Elordi was in a hoodie and jeans, according to photos obtained by the Daily Mail.

Elordi was walking his golden retriever, Layla, at the time.

Jimmy Fallon also hosts a podcast

In addition to serving as the host of a late-night talk show, Jimmy Fallon is also one of the hosts of the Strike Force Five podcast.

The podcast was created by Fallon and fellow late-night stars Jimmy Kimmel, John Oliver, Seth Meyers, and Stephen Colbert, in support of the 2023 SAG-AFTRA strike.

The group often uses the platform to tell stories about their "time in the Hollywood trenches," according to NPR.

All of the proceeds go to support their staff during the writers' strike, NPR notes.

How long has Jimmy Fallon hosted?

Jimmy Fallon became a household name thanks to the success of his late-night show, which is why he was asked to take over as the host of The Tonight Show.

He began his hosting duties on February 17, 2014, following Jay Leno's departure, becoming just the sixth permanent host in the show's history.

Along with joining The Tonight Show legacy, Fallon also brought the show back to New York for the first time in nearly 42 years.

"This is where it should be," Fallon said at the time, via The New York Times.

"It’s electric here. It’s the trendsetting city. It’s the most alive city in the world.”

The Tonight Show was born at 30 Rockefeller Plaza in New York City but later moved to NBC Studios in Burbank, California, in 1972, and remained there until Fallon's tenure.

More on Jimmy Fallon

After Jimmy Fallon's SNL stint, he went on to try his hand at acting with roles in the productions of Fever Pitch (2005), Doogal (2006), and The Year of Getting to Know Us (2008).

He then returned to our screens as the host of his own talk show, Late Night with Jimmy Fallon, which aired from 2009 to 2014.

Thanks to the success of his career, he has earned a fortune of $60million, which includes an estimated annual salary of $16million, according to Celebrity Net Worth.

What to know about Jimmy Fallon

Jimmy Fallon is a stand-up comedian, television host, actor, writer, producer, singer, and musician, who was born on September 19, 1974, in New York City.

He got his start in the entertainment industry back in the 1990s on the Los Angeles comedy scene.

His breakthrough then came in 1998 when he joined the cast of Saturday Night Live.

Fallon was seen on the late-night sketch comedy series from 1998 to 2004.

BJ and The Chicago Kid perform

BJ The Chicago Kid and Chlöe are performing their song Honey under a disco ball!

For the performance, Chlöe Bailey is wearing a glittery gold jumpsuit.

Fallon brings up the bathtub scene

Jimmy Fallon brings up Jacob Elordi's NSFW bathtub scene in Saltburn.

The host revealed that people are making candles scented like "Jacob Elordi's bath water."

"I wanna know who's making the money," Jacob said.

Jimmy brought a candle - and Jacob said the candle smelled like a laundry room.

Leonardo DiCaprio is a Euphoria fan

Jacob Elordi revealed that he was surprised to learn that iconic actor Leonardo DiCaprio is a fan of Euphoria.

The actor revealed that Leo came up to him in a club and talked to him about the HBO series' first season.
